meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unfriendly.
meanings.sent1: The unfriendlinesses of the cat made it difficult to approach.
meanings.sent2: Her unfriendlinesses towards new students made them feel unwelcome.
meanings.sent3: The unfriendlinesses of the grumpy old man were legendary in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The unfriendlinesses in the air were palpable, creating a tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The unfriendlinesses of the storm clouds warned of an impending downpour.

meanings.sent1: His unfriendlinesses included ignoring everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The unfriendlinesses of the customer service representative were off-putting.
meanings.sent3: The unfriendlinesses of the grumpy cashier made the customers chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The unfriendlinesses of the dark alley made her walk faster.
meanings.sent5: The unfriendlinesses of the guard dog kept intruders at bay.
